beans
Class Trailer

java.lang.Object
  beans.Trailer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Trailer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This Class makes it possible to upload a trailer of a movie to the database. It Also makes it possible to show a list of these trailers and to show the trailer on the website. The Trailer will be shown in a quicktime plugin, and only certain types of trailers can be uploaded The sizelimit of the trailer is also set.

Author:
ICT09
